Page.description: A tool that helps network engineers efficiently divide an IP network into subnets of varying sizes using Variable Length Subnet Masking (VLSM). It calculates subnet addresses, broadcast addresses, and host ranges for optimized IP allocation.

UserInputs.desiredSubnetworksDescription: List the required subnets by specifying the number of hosts needed for each segment.

validation.insufficientSpace: *Insufficient network mask space, you need at least /{closestValidMask} ({mask})

RootUsageAllocation.title: ROOT NETWORK RANGE USAGE
RootUsageAllocation.description: Overall Root Network Address Space Utilization

SubnetAllocation.title: SUBNET ALLOCATION
SubnetAllocation.description: Internal Subnet Capacity and Host Distribution
